mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, POST_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{postNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, POST_NO, POINT, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, PROFILE_IMG, ISADMIN, IS_SOCIAL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{detailAddress}, POST_NO = #{postNo} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 'Y'
